text: Xin Wu, the Defier of Fate
Legendary Lord
Defier of Fate
Defier of Fate
A gift from the Celestial Dragons, capable of severing the threads of fate and bringing destined death to all things. With Xin Wu's demise, this ominous demonic sword was also sealed away.
A gift from the Celestial Dragons, capable of severing the threads of fate and bringing destined death to all things. With Xin Wu's demise, this ominous demonic sword was also sealed away.

The hero Xin Wu, the rebel Xin Wu, the Defier of Fate Xin Wu. His destiny was written in the Book of Prophecies, destined to bring destruction to Grand Cathay. For this, Grand Cathay became his enemy, and the Celestial Dragons bestowed their blessings upon him. He was supposed to bring complete destruction to Cathay amidst its division and conflict, but he, a mere mortal, mocked fate and the Celestial Dragons, bringing salvation to Cathay in his own way... However, this is not the end of Xin Wu's story.
Xin Wu has once again escaped the fate of death, but this time he will obey the will of Tzeentch, bringing destined destruction to Grand Cathay.
Xin Wu, the Defier of Fate
Xin Wu, the Defier of Fate
Even if the flow of fate cannot be defied, the struggle of mortals still holds meaning. Until the final moment arrives, Xin Wu will continue to fight for Grand Cathay.
Remorseful Flames
Time cannot be reversed, the past cannot be undone, the flames of remorse constantly gnaw at Xin Wu's body and mind.
Defier of Fate
Fate is something that can be cut down with a sword.
Raven's Whispers
Xin Wu's ears are constantly filled with the whispers of ravens, granting him extraordinary wisdom but driving all others who hear them to madness.
Blazing Blood
With each beat of Xin Wu's heart, scorching blood surges from his neck, transforming into blazing flames. Wherever this fire passes, all things turn to ashes.
The Art of War

The memories of a mortal general awaken in Xin Wu's mind, recalling the art of commanding armies... even though his head has been severed by his own demonic sword, and even the Celestial Dragons' power cannot reattach it.
Fated Death
All mortals must die, all mortals must serve.
Activates the ability: "Fated Death"
The Undying
Death is not the end, but the beginning. The sleeper will awaken, crossing the barrier that mortals cannot overcome, the knight will return to the mortal world.
Activates the army ability: "Defier of Fate"\\n(Cathay-controlled regions)
Defier of Fate
Even if the flow of fate cannot be defied, the struggle of mortals still holds meaning. Until the final moment arrives, Xin Wu will continue to fight for Grand Cathay.
Xin Wu comes to aid the battle.
